entry.title: Organic Gomden
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 90.00

This rectangular buckwheat filled cushion was designed by a Tibetan meditation master and is usually used in conjunction with a zabuton.

Features

  • Filled will organic buckwheat
  • Cased in organic cotton twill
  • Measures 11x15x5"
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Yoga Mat Tote
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 34.99 - 42.99 (8 variants)

Designed for yogis and yoginas on the go, this tote features a toggle drawstring closure and a zippered pocket. It fits our Natural Grass Yoga Mat and most sticky mats with room to spare for your yoga strap.

Features

  • Available in conventional or organic cotton canvas
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Yoga Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 10.00

This 6' long cotton strap with a D ring allows you to find flexibility and quiet in poses that would otherwise be out of reach.  Black only.  We are no longer carrying the natural colour.

Features

  • Measures 6' x 1"
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Recycled Foam Block
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 14.99

These lightweight blocks are used to support the thighs in sitting poses and to provide the perfect surface for shoulder stands.

Features

  • Made of recycled foam
  • Measures 8" x 12" x 2" (20cm x 30cm x 5cm)
  • Made in Canada
  • Covers are available separately:
    • Regular cotton
    • Organic cotton

entry.title: Regular Shiatsu Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 129.00 - 199.00 (12 variants)

This mat may be used for bodywork as well as for restorative yoga poses. Fold in half to use as a zabuton and roll and secure with its fabric ties to use as a large bolster and for easy storage and transport. Also an ideal camping mat or guest bed.    

Features

  • Stuffed with 2 layers of cotton felting
  • Cased in cotton canvas with matching fabric ties
  • Measures either 24" x 75" (61cm x 190cm) or 30" x 75" (76cm x 190cm)
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Square Zabuton
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 75.00 - 150.00 (24 variants)

This traditional square floor cushion is used on its own or beneath a zafu or gomden to provide ankle and knee support.

Features

  • Stuffed with either 2 or 4 layers of cotton felting
  • Cased in cotton canvas
  • Measures 24" x 24" or 30"x30"
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Rectangular Zabuton with Ties
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 59.00

This floor cushion is used on its own or beneath a zafu or gomden to provide ankle and knee support and comes with fabric ties to enable the zabuton to be rolled for use as a large bolster and for easy transport. The greater dimensions accommodate those with long legs or those who prefer more coverage.

Features

  • Stuffed with 2 layers of cotton felting
  • Cased in cotton canvas
  • Measures 24" x 30" (61cm x 76cm)
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Wedge Buckwheat Zafu
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 110.00

This buckwheat filled cushion offers the lowest height and greatest stability of our zafus due to its size and shape. This cushion is designed for those looking for more ease in their seated meditation. It may be used in conjunction with a zabuton for added comfort.

Features

  • Filled with natural buckwheat hulls
  • Cased in cotton canvas
  • Measures 19" x 22" x 8" (48cm x 56cm x 20cm)
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Organic Crescent Buckwheat Zafu
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 105.00

Intended to be used as a wedge between your bottom and the floor, this cushion is slightly lower and more flexible than the kapok variety while the crescent shape offers even greater stability for those new to seated meditation and those with limited flexibility. It may be used in conjunction with a zabuton for added comfort.

Features

  • Filled with organic buckwheat
  • Cased in organic twill
  • Measures 14.5" x 10"x 7.5" (37cm x 27cm 19cm)
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Sama Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 30.00

This superiorly crafted yoga bolster is designed to aid relaxation, build strength, and improve body alignment. Our props allow you to achieve and sustain poses with greater ease by giving you the confidence to further your practice without strain or fear of injury. The small buckwheat filled sama bolster can help eliminate disc compression and stress on the upper vertebrae when tucked under the neck in chest opening poses. It may also be used as a gentle weight on the abdomen in restorative poses.

Features

  • Filled with natural buckwheat hulls
  • Cased in cotton canvas
  • Measures 4" x 12" (10cm x 30.5cm)
  • Well made in Canada

entry.title: Prana Bolster
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dream Designs
Type: Yoga
Price: 59.00

This superiorly crafted yoga bolster is designed to aid relaxation, build strength, and improve body alignment. Our props allow you to achieve and sustain poses with greater ease by giving you the confidence to further your practice without strain or fear of injury. The narrow rectangular prana bolster is typically used by those practicing breath work who want a gentle lift or those with a more slender body frame.

Features

  • Conventional cotton batting
  • Cased in cotton canvas
  • Measures 4" x 6" x 27" (10cm x 15cm x 68.5cm)
  • Well made in Canada
